name: Hornet ORAM
tagline: Recursive Unified ORAM with Integrity Verification
body:
### Cloning Repository
```
$ cd /path/to/repo_root
$ git clone git@github.com:kwonalbert/oram.git
```
NOTE: git@github.com works only if you have ssh key installed.

### Authors and Contributors
Chris Fletcher (MIT) @cwfletcher

Ling Ren (MIT) @renling

Albert Kwon (MIT) @kwonalbert
